title: As a user I want to be able to print the CEP tab of a professional player profile
custom_steps:
Wireframe: 
http://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=printing

Acceptance Criteria: 
* If a user has permission to see a player profile, then they see a Print button on the profile.
* Clicking "Print" will generate a pdf of the player's CEP tab. 
* The pdf will ONLY display what the logged in user has permission to see on the CEP tab within the app.
* If the user doesn't have CSP/CEP permissions, they will not see the option in the print modal.
* If the player doesn't have a CSP/CEP, the option will not appear in the print modal.
* The width of the info should be limited to one page, with text wrapping as necessary. 
* The top of the pdf should contain the Player's Roster Name, Middle Initial, Last Name, baseball position, Club/Org, MLS, MJ and MN roster status and Player ID.

title: MLBPA Rosters API Requirements Documentation
custom_steps:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Feed+Requirements+-+Rosters+for+MLPA

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Review existing SQL queries from ebis1 data feeds
* Translate queries into documentation that can be used to build an API endpoint
* Documentation will be saved on the provided wiki link
* The two SQL queries should be combined into 1 API endpoint, if possible

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Rookie Career Development Report
custom_steps:
Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rookie+Career+Development+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rookie+Career+Development+Report+Details

Report Logic: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=118479988

Report Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Rookie+Career+Development+Program+Report+-+Prompts

View Story: #151620926

Acceptance Criteria: 
* "Rookie Career Development" is a report in the Report listing widget. Selecting this report from the widget will launch the prompts according to the requirements. 
* The category of this report should be "Pro Player Management". 
* Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
* The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.

title: As a user I want to see the Signing Scout info from ebis1 reflected in ebis2
custom_steps:
'**AC**
- The Signing scout field on the Player profile Draft and Scouting tab should be populated with any values from ebis1. 
- If no value exists from ebis1, it should be blank.
